ValidationRule.description: Prevents Compliance Child Case from being created if data is missing
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Requested") && RecordTypeId = "0121G000000RlLiQAK" && ( Calculation_Formula__c = "" || ISPICKVAL( Are_there_5_Owners__c , "") || ISPICKVAL( X5_Owners_On_Census__c , "") || ISPICKVAL( Owners_through_Attribution__c , "") || ISPICKVAL( Owners_through_Attribution_on_Census__c , "") || ISPICKVAL( Has_the_client_requested_a_special__c , "") || ISBLANK( Calculation_Type__c ) = TRUE || Census__c = False || ISPICKVAL(Company_Entity_Type__c, "") || Contribution_Budget__c = "" || ISPICKVAL(Owners__c, "") || Plan_Year_Request__c = "" || ISPICKVAL(Verified_Census__c, ""))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please ensure there are no blank entries on the Calculation Object. Compliance is unable to process calculations unless all fields are completed.
